name: spookmarkschrome
description: Bookmarks that come back to haunt you.

scripts.zip: echo 'Zip with version number:' && node -p -e "require('./manifest.json').version" && read -p 'Press enter to being zipping.' && zip -r ../spookmarks$(node -p -e "require('./manifest.json').version").zip ./ -x '*.DS_Store'

author: Dr. Wicked
